subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Curt Schilling came within one out of his first career no-hitter yesterday, losing his bid when Shannon Stewart lined a clean single to right field in Boston’s 1-0 victory against the Oakland Athletics.
snippet: Curt Schilling came within one out of his first career no-hitter yesterday, losing his bid when Shannon Stewart lined a clean single to right field in Boston’s 1-0 victory against the Oakland Athletics.
